WorkItem.Description: The crit rate is way too high in Rawr. It shown 36.32% (924.55). However, if I deselect "Arcane Barrage" from my Talents section, the Crit rate will change to 30.80% (671). This is more the less the correct value for my mage. The "Arcane Barrage" should have no effect on the crit rating. I also confrim this with my rating in my on game character sheet.
WorkItem.Summary: Wrong crit rate for my Mage

Comments.Message: The first value is with Molten Armor. When you drop Arcane Barrage for some reason Mage Armor gets better which is why the crit rate drops.
